name: 蔡銘修
objective:
認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
1. How to analyze a research paper.
2. How to construct a research paper.
3. How to write summaries and critiques.
schedule:
01 02/25 Intro(research topic)
02 03/04 Endnote
03 03/11 Prospectus-1
04 03/18 Prospectus-2
05 03/25 Writing Summaries-1
06 04/01 Writing Summaries-2
07 04/08 Research Introduction-1
08 04/15 Research Introduction-2(turn in Introduction)
09 04/22 Midterm Week
10 04/29 Research Literature Review(turn in Literature Review)
11 05/06 Research Method-1
12 05/13 Research Method-2(turn in Method)
13 05/20 Research Result and Discussion-1(turn in Result)
14 05/27 Research Conclusion
15 06/03 Final Presentation-1(check Literature Database)
16 06/10 Conference Week
17 06/17 Final Presentation-2
18 06/24 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 10%
2. In Class Assignments 20%
3. Final Presentation 20%
4. Literature Database 5%
5. Final Research Paper 35%
6. Submission Proof for a Journal or Conference. 10%
materials:
Academic Writing for Graduate Students
John M. Swales And C
University of Michig
